detail_desc: Trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waistband, fake fly, diagonal front pockets and fake back pockets.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some mohair with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves, buttons down the front and two slits at the front hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with pleats at the top, a zip at the back and side pockets.
Large shopper in cotton canvas with long handles at the top and large patch pockets at the sides. Unlined. Depth 20 cm. Height 35 cm. Width 50 cm.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
High-waisted shorts woven in a linen blend with a zip fly, pleats at the top, side pockets and a belt with a covered buckle.
Shirt in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar embellished with sparkly stones, concealed fasteners down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket, side pockets, back pockets and narrow hems.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hair scrunchies in elasticated fabric.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Wide-fitting, V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a large hood and long sleeves.

Jacket in a light, Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high stand-up collar with press-studs, zip down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Wide elastication at the waist and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy cotton denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Metal earrings with fabric tassels. Length 11 cm.
Flat cap in cotton chambray with covered elastication at the back. Lined.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe. Gently draped, double layered top, a seam under the bust, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, A-line suede skirt with side pockets and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar and half-length button placket with a classic front. Yoke at the back and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining at the top and a quilted lining at the bottom.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs.
Trousers in soft leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems. Viscose twill lining at the top.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist panel, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Padded bomber jacket with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a wrapover drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Longer cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Set with a sweatshirt and pair of joggers. Long-sleeved sweatshirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Short blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and an open back with a button at the back of the neck and ties at the hem. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, long puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Longer-style, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and long sleeves.

Bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative tab at the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, insoles in imitation leather, and chunky soles. Heel 3.2 cm.
Short dungaree dress in washed denim with adjustable straps with a metal fastener at the front. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides, fake fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. Sleeves lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Satin playsuit with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a loose wrapover front with ties at one side.
Baby Exclusive. Puff shorts in a crinkled organic cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie at the hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Patterned blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in stretch satin with a slight sheen. Narrow notch lapels with stitching at the edges, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, a single button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, lightweight wool jersey.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a high collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and zipped side pockets. Rounded and longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck, buttons at the top and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a small, frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Wide flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Blouse in cotton jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and flounces at the hem.
